business_description: Facility management company specializing in Building Management Systems as a Service (BaaS). The firm delivers energy-efficient solutions through IoT, cloud technology, and AI, operating on an operational expense (OPEX) model where fees represent a portion of realized energy savings
service_model: Rent-to-own approach based on ESCo (Energy Saving Contracting) principles, enabling customers to achieve energy and cost reductions without upfront capital investment
services: Building Management Systems as a Service (BaaS)
